div.div: Activities are divided into multiple corpus collections so that different transformations and subsets of ativities can be represented. These URL reference activities and summaries in the 'test' corpus whihc is the current working set

ul.li: A list of all Countries with Activities showing overall counts and project values. The columns are sortable by clicking on a heading, so you can order by name, code, the total number of activities, the number included in the AidView interface (activity-status code 2 or 3) or total project value
A Country Summary for Afganistan showing overall counts and project values. From there there we can link to related country sites via the OpenCirce site eg.

A list of all Activities for which Afganistan is a participating country. This list is paginated although a full list is also available (to be used with caution when there is a large number of activities). The list currently shows only the identifier and the title but other properties could be easily included.
A list of all Sectors with Activities showing the same summary data as for Countries
Summary for Primary Education (11220) showing overall counts and project values. From there there is a link to multiple country links via the OpenCirce site.

Other facets currently supported are
Sector Category a higher level grouping of Sectors
Region
Funding Organisations
Participant Organisations
Other facets can be added. For example the activity-status is an obvious omission as is the reporting organisation.

Strenthening Provincial HIV Program An activity rendered to HTML This representation links onwards to related activities and also to the country, funder, participants and other summary facets as well as any links in the activity itself, such as documents and websites.
